import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ id: '', productName: '', price: '', category: '', details: [{ color: '', size: '', quantity: '', }], description: '', imagePath: [] }); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data } = useSelector(state => state.listCategory); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.getListCategories()); }, [dispatch]) const handleChangeColor = (e, index) => { const newDetail = state.details; newDetail[index].color = e.target.value; setState({ ...state, details: newDetail }) } const handleChangeSize = (e, index) => { } const handleChangeQuantity = (e, index) => { } return (

setState({ ...state, productName: e.target.value })} />
setState({ ...state, price: e.target.value })} />
{ state && state.details.map((item, index) =>
handleChangeColor(e, index)} />
handleChangeQuantity(e, index)} />

) }

setState({ ...state, imagePath: [...state.imagePath, ...[e.target.files[0].name]] })} />
) }
